# Rsamadlibs

Solved by : Aaditya and Jon

##### Formulas :) 
```
c = pow(M,e,N)
d = pow(c,d,N)
phi = (p-1)*(q-1)
n = p*q
d = e.inverse_mod(phi)
1 < e <= |phi(n)|
euler_phi(n) -- Totient
(d*e)%phi = 1
e is a co-prime of N and phi
```

##### Solution :)

```
picoCTF{d0_u_kn0w_th3_w@y_2_RS@_c6724916}
```
